statements: UPDATE SalaryData SET current_salary = 60000, target_salary = 70000 WHERE employee_id = 101
UPDATE SalaryData SET years_of_experience = 4, industry = 'Technology' WHERE employee_id = 102
UPDATE SalaryData SET target_salary = 90000.50, current_salary = 80000, years_of_experience = years_of_experience + 1 WHERE employee_id = 1234 AND industry = 'Tech';
UPDATE SalaryData SET current_salary = current_salary * 1.05, years_of_experience = years_of_experience + 2 WHERE employee_id = 5678 AND industry = 'Finance';
UPDATE salary_data SET current_salary = 70000 WHERE employee_id = 101
UPDATE job_transitions SET new_job_title = 'Senior Engineer', new_salary = 80000 WHERE employee_id = 201
UPDATE salary_data SET current_salary = current_salary * 1.1, years_experience = years_experience + 1 WHERE employee_id = 101
UPDATE job_transitions SET previous_job_title = 'Senior Engineer', new_job_title = 'Lead Engineer', previous_salary = previous_salary * 1.05, new_salary = new_salary * 1.1 WHERE employee_id = 201
UPDATE salary_data SET current_salary = 65000 WHERE employee_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE job_transitions SET salary_increase = 2000, new_job_title = 'Senior Developer' WHERE employee_id = 102;
UPDATE salary_data SET current_salary = 65000.00, job_title = 'Senior Engineer' WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE job_transitions SET salary_increase = 5000.00, new_job_title = 'Lead Engineer' WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE employee SET current_salary = 60000 WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE job_comparisons SET potential_salary = 75000, negotiation_outcome = 'Accepted' WHERE comparison_id = 201;
UPDATE employee SET job_title = 'Senior Manager' WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE compensation_data SET reported_salary = 75000.00, negotiation_notes = 'Agreed on new benefits package' WHERE employee_id = 201;
UPDATE salary_data SET current_salary = 75000 WHERE employee_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE job_transitions SET new_salary = 80000, new_job_title = 'Senior Engineer' WHERE employee_id = 123;
UPDATE salary_data SET current_salary = current_salary * 1.05, job_title = 'Senior Engineer' WHERE employee_name = 'Alice' AND id = 101;
UPDATE job_transitions SET new_salary = 75000.00, new_job_title = 'Manager' WHERE employee_id = 201;
